bboxes.raw_text:
NEW YORK, N.Y.-Three out
standing women students, grad
uating from colleges affiliated
with the United Negro College
Fund. won fellowships for their
first year of graduate study.


DR.. William E. Cope, director
of educational services for the
Fund, announced that winners of
Lasker fellowships are Lois G.
Gray of Xavier University, New
Orleans, Louisiana: Carol Ann
Scott of Knoxville College, Knox
Vile, Tennessee; and Mamie Lou
White. Talladega College, Tai
ladega. Alabama.


This is the fifteenth year the
United Negro College Fund is
administering this fellowship
program initiated by gift from
Florina Lasker in l949 to assist
outstanding women graduates of
member institutions with post
graduate study. In 1860 Loula
Lasker left legacy to be used
for a similar purpose.


Winners of fellowships this
year. totaling $4,000, will go on
to graduate study in Catholic and
Howard Universities. Washing
ton. Dc. and Rutgers Univer-
sity, New Brunswick, New Jer-
sey. Their fields of interest are
educational psychology, library
science, and mathematics.

BLOOMINGTON, Ind. A
house in an all-white neigh
borhood was destroyed by fire
yesterday several hours before
Negro family occupied it.
Authorities termed it arson.


Edgar Hays, barbershop
porter, and his sister, Liddia,
who had been displaced by an
urban renewal project, had
rented the five-room frame
house.

Hamilton Posner, president the Posner Company the
worlds largest manufacturers of hair
for Negroes is orng of the story
lean Negroes at the New York Worlds Fair.


Cooperating Heritage Exposition Mr. Posner
selected the centrally located Hall of Education for
entitled The Achievements Progress of Negro
AT the entrance in series of illuminated porthoe pictures
incorporated in huge mural the history Poners
Bergamot Hair Conditioner is wildly portrayed.


The first historical records of bergamo
OF Sheba Ethiopia introduction Cleopatra
final development through modern science the
hair conditioner available today is traced series of interesting
etchngs and photographs with engraved in luce panels


Posners Bergamot Hair Conditioner 1.-THE with STAR
the original bergamot country almost 100
years ago.

Want something original in
greeting cards or party invita-
tons? Make a photogram. Place
a cut-out of an appropriate deco
ration on Photographic paper, ex-
pose to light and develop. You'll

have a silhouette design on the
paper. Halloween masks, tur-
keys, Christmas trees are three
suggestions. Lettering can be re-
produced the same way. Use COL
or-toned paper for added effect.

NEGROES HOME

full articles.headline: Novel Idea For Cards
full articles.article:
Want something original in
greeting cards or party invita-
tons? Make a photogram. Place
a cut-out of an appropriate deco
ration on Photographic paper, ex-
pose to light and develop. You'll

have a silhouette design on the
paper. Halloween masks, tur-
keys, Christmas trees are three
suggestions. Lettering can be re-
produced the same way. Use COL
or-toned paper for added effect.
